leads.lead_text: Flowers 10–20 mm diam.; perianth white to cream-coloured with purple or blue throat; capsule (3–)4–6 mm diam. annual or perennial herb
Flowers 5–9 mm diam.; perianth yellow with purple-brown markings in throat, or mauve to lilac with purple throat; capsule 2–3(–4) mm diam.; annual herb
